00016 
00017 // compute ray-segment intersection
00018 // choose between [(x1, y1), (x2, y1)], [(x2, y1), (x2, y2)],
00019 //   [(x2, y2), (x1, y2)] and [(x1, y2), (x1, y2)] segments
00020 // solve
00021 //   bx  + ax * t = bx  + ax * s
00022 //     1     1        2     2 
00023 //   by  + ay * t = by  + ay * s 
00024 //     1     1        2     2
00025 // simultameous equations and check if t > 0 && 0 <= s <= 1
00026 
00027 static bool ray_segment_intersection(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, \
00028   double bx1, double by1, double ax1, double ay1, double* t, double* s)
00029 {
00030   double bx2 = x1;
00031   double by2 = y1;
00032   double ax2 = x2 - x1;
00033   double ay2 = y2 - y1;
00034   double cx = bx2 - bx1;
00035   double cy = by2 - by1;
00036   double dd = ay1 * ax2 - ax1 * ay2;
00037   /*
00038   if (fabs(dd) < 1.0e-12)
00039   {
00040     return false;
00041   }
00042   */
00043   *t = (ax2 * cy - ay2 * cx) / dd;
00044   *s = (ax1 * cy - ay1 * cx) / dd;
00045   return true;
00046 }
00047 static bool ray_rectangle_intersection(double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2, \
00048   double bx, double by, double ax, double ay, double* x, double* y)
00049 {
00050   double t, s;
00051   if (ray_segment_intersection(x1, y1, x2, y1, bx, by, ax, ay, &t, &s) \
00052     && t > 0 && 0.0 <= s && s <= 1.0)
00053   {
00054     *x = bx + ax * t;
00055     *y = by + ay * t;
00056     return true;
00057   }
00058   if (ray_segment_intersection(x2, y1, x2, y2, bx, by, ax, ay, &t, &s) \
00059     && t > 0 && 0.0 <= s && s <= 1.0)
00060   {
00061     *x = bx + ax * t;
00062     *y = by + ay * t;
00063     return true;
00064   }
00065   if (ray_segment_intersection(x2, y2, x1, y2, bx, by, ax, ay, &t, &s) \
00066     && t > 0 && 0.0 <= s && s <= 1.0)
00067   {
00068     *x = bx + ax * t;
00069     *y = by + ay * t;
00070     return true;
00071   }
00072   if (ray_segment_intersection(x1, y2, x1, y1, bx, by, ax, ay, &t, &s) \
00073     && t > 0 && 0.0 <= s && s <= 1.0)
00074   {
00075     *x = bx + ax * t;
00076     *y = by + ay * t;
00077     return true;
00078   }
00079   return false;
00080 }
00081 
00082 void voro(int np, const double xx[1], const double yy[1], \
00083   double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2, \
00084   vertex_type& ver, edge_type& pgn, curve_type* arr[1])
00085 {
00086   leda::point_set p_data;
00087   leda::node_map<int> s_data(p_data);
00088   for (int i = 0; i < np; ++i)
00089   {
00090     double x = xx[i];
00091     double y = yy[i];
00092     arr[i] = 0;
00093     if (x1 <= x && x <= x2 && y1 <= y && y <= y2)
00094     {
00095       leda_point p(x, y);
00096       leda_node n = p_data.lookup(p);
00097       if (n == leda_nil)
00098       {
00099         n = p_data.insert(p);
00100         s_data[n] = i;
00101       }
00102       else
00103       {
00104         std::clog << "point number " << i << " is duplicate\n";
00105       }
00106     }
00107     else
00108     {
00109       std::clog << "point number " << i << " is situated beyond of region of interest\n";
00110     }
00111   }
00112 
00113   leda::GRAPH<leda_circle, leda_point> v_data;
00114   p_data.compute_voronoi(v_data);
00115 
00116   // check
00117   /*
00118   leda::edge_map<int> e_sign(v_data, 1);
00119   {
00120     leda::edge e;
00121     forall_edges(e, v_data)
00122     {
00123       leda::point s_point, t_point;
00124       bool has_s_point = false;
00125       bool has_t_point = false;
00126 
00127       leda::node s = v_data.source(e);
00128       leda::circle s_circle = v_data[s];
00129       if (!s_circle.is_degenerate())
00130       {
00131         s_point = s_circle.center();
00132         has_s_point = true;
00133       }
00134 
00135       leda::node t = v_data.target(e);
00136       leda::circle t_circle = v_data[t];
00137       if (!t_circle.is_degenerate())
00138       {
00139         t_point = t_circle.center();
00140         has_t_point = true;
00141       }
00142 
00143       if (has_s_point && has_t_point)
00144       {
00145         double x1 = s_point.xcoord();
00146         double y1 = s_point.ycoord();
00147         double x2 = t_point.xcoord();
00148         double y2 = t_point.ycoord();
00149         double a = y2 - y1;
00150         double b = x1 - x2;
00151         double c = 1.0 / hypot(a, b);
00152         a *= c;
00153         b *= c;
00154         c = -(a * x1 + b * y1);
00155 
00156         leda::point p = v_data[e];
00157         double x = p.xcoord();
00158         double y = p.ycoord();
00159         double s = a * x + b * y + c;
00160         if (s < 0.0)
00161         {
00162           e_sign[e] = -1;
00163         }
00164       }
00165     }
00166   }
00167   */
00168 
00169   leda_node n;
00170   leda::node_map<int> v_index(v_data, -1);
00171   forall_nodes(n, v_data)
00172   {
00173     leda::circle c = v_data[n];
00174     if (!c.is_degenerate())
00175     {
00176       leda::point p = c.center();
00177       if (x1 <= p.xcoord() && p.xcoord() <= x2 && y1 <= p.ycoord() && p.ycoord() <= y2)
00178       {
00179         v_index[n] = ver.size();
00180         ver.push_back(coord_type());
00181         coord_type* q = &ver.back();
00182         q->xcoord = p.xcoord();
00183         q->ycoord = p.ycoord();
00184       }
00185     }
00186   }
00187 
00188   leda::edge e;
00189   leda::edge_map<int> v_outer(v_data, -1);
00190   forall_edges(e, v_data)
00191   {
00192     leda::node s = v_data.source(e);
00193     if (v_index[s] == -1)
00194       continue;
00195 
00196     leda::node t = v_data.target(e);
00197     if (v_index[t] != -1)
00198       continue;
00199 
00200     leda::circle s_circ = v_data[s];
00201     // if (s_circ.is_degenerate())
00202     //   continue;
00203 
00204     leda::point p = s_circ.center();
00205     double bx = p.xcoord();
00206     double by = p.ycoord();
00207     // if (x1 == bx || x2 == bx || y1 == by || y2 == by)
00208     //   continue;
00209 
00210     leda::circle t_circ = v_data[t];
00211     double ax, ay;
00212     if (t_circ.is_degenerate())
00213     {
00214       // clip ray
00215       leda::edge e_succ = v_data.cyclic_adj_succ(e);
00216       leda::node n_succ = v_data.target(e_succ);
00217       leda::circle c_succ = v_data[n_succ];
00218       assert(!c_succ.is_degenerate());
00219       leda::point p_succ = c_succ.center();
00220       double dx_succ = p_succ.xcoord() - bx;
00221       double dy_succ = p_succ.ycoord() - by;
00222       double dd_succ = hypot(dx_succ, dy_succ);
00223 
00224       leda::edge e_pred = v_data.cyclic_adj_pred(e);
00225       leda::node n_pred = v_data.target(e_pred);
00226       leda::circle c_pred = v_data[n_pred];
00227       assert(!c_pred.is_degenerate());
00228       leda::point p_pred = c_pred.center();
00229       double dx_pred = p_pred.xcoord() - bx;
00230       double dy_pred = p_pred.ycoord() - by;
00231       double dd_pred = hypot(dx_pred, dy_pred);
00232 
00233       ax = dx_succ / dd_succ + dx_pred / dd_pred;
00234       ay = dy_succ / dd_succ + dy_pred / dd_pred;
00235       double aa = -hypot(ax, ay);
00236       ax /= aa;
00237       ay /= aa;
00238     }
00239     else
00240     {
00241       // clip edge
00242       leda::point q = t_circ.center();
00243       ax = q.xcoord() - bx;
00244       ay = q.ycoord() - by;
00245 
00246       double aa = hypot(ax, ay);
00247       ax /= aa;
00248       ay /= aa;
00249 
00250       double gx = 0.0, gy = 0.0;
00251       leda::edge e_succ = v_data.cyclic_adj_succ(e);
00252       leda::node n_succ = v_data.target(e_succ);
00253       leda::circle c_succ = v_data[n_succ];
00254       if (!c_succ.is_degenerate())
00255       {
00256         leda::point p_succ = c_succ.center();
00257         double dx_succ = p_succ.xcoord() - bx;
00258         double dy_succ = p_succ.ycoord() - by;
00259         double dd_succ = hypot(dx_succ, dy_succ);
00260         gx += dx_succ / dd_succ;
00261         gy += dy_succ / dd_succ;
00262       }
00263       leda::edge e_pred = v_data.cyclic_adj_pred(e);
00264       leda::node n_pred = v_data.target(e_pred);
00265       leda::circle c_pred = v_data[n_pred];
00266       if (!c_pred.is_degenerate())
00267       {
00268         leda::point p_pred = c_pred.center();
00269         double dx_pred = p_pred.xcoord() - bx;
00270         double dy_pred = p_pred.ycoord() - by;
00271         double dd_pred = hypot(dx_pred, dy_pred);
00272         gx += dx_pred / dd_pred;
00273         gy += dy_pred / dd_pred;
00274       }
00275       double gg = -hypot(ax, ay);
00276       gx /= gg;
00277       gy /= gg;
00278 
00279       if (gx * ax + gy * ay < 0.0)
00280       {
00281         ax = -ax;
00282         ay = -ay;
00283       }
00284     }
00285 
00286     double x, y;
00287     if (!ray_rectangle_intersection(x1, x2, y1, y2, bx, by, ax, ay, &x, &y))
00288     {
00289       assert(false);
00290     }
00291     
00292     v_outer[e] = v_outer[v_data.reversal(e)] = ver.size();
00293     ver.push_back(coord_type());
00294     coord_type* q = &ver.back();
00295     q->xcoord = x;
00296     q->ycoord = y;
00297   }
00298 
00299   leda::edge_map<bool> visit(v_data, false);
00300   forall_edges(e, v_data)
00301   {
00302     if (visit[e])
00303       continue;
00304 
00305     leda::list<leda::point> p_label;
00306     edge_type temp;
00307     curve_type* c = 0;
00308     leda::edge ee = e;
00309     do
00310     {
00311       leda::node s = v_data.source(ee);
00312       if (v_index[s] != -1)
00313       {
00314         leda::node t = v_data.target(ee);
00315         if (v_index[t] != -1)
00316         {
00317           if (c == 0 || c->back() != v_index[s])
00318           {
00319             temp.push_back(curve_type());
00320             c = &temp.back();
00321             c->push_back(v_index[s]);
00322             c->push_back(v_index[t]);
00323           }
00324           else
00325           {
00326             c->push_back(v_index[t]);
00327           }
00328         }
00329         else if (v_outer[ee] != -1)
00330         {
00331           if (c == 0 || c->back() != v_index[s])
00332           {
00333             temp.push_back(curve_type());
00334             c = &temp.back();
00335             c->push_back(v_index[s]);
00336             c->push_back(v_outer[ee]);
00337           }
00338           else
00339           {
00340             c->push_back(v_outer[ee]);
00341           }
00342           c = 0;
00343         }
00344         else
00345         {
00346           c = 0;
00347         }
00348       }
00349       else
00350       {
00351         leda::node t = v_data.target(ee);
00352         if (v_index[t] != -1 && v_outer[ee] != -1)
00353         {
00354           temp.push_back(curve_type());
00355           c = &temp.back();
00356           c->push_back(v_outer[ee]);
00357           c->push_back(v_index[t]);
00358         }
00359         else
00360         {
00361           c = 0;
00362         }
00363       }
00364       visit[ee] = true;
00365       p_label.push_back(v_data[ee]);
00366       leda::edge rr = v_data.reversal(ee);
00367       s = v_data.source(rr);
00368       ee = v_data.cyclic_adj_pred(rr);
00369       int s_degree = v_data.degree(s);
00370       if (s_degree < 3)
00371       {
00372         // back propagation for outer edges
00373         ee = e;
00374         c = 0;
00375         s = v_data.source(ee);
00376         s_degree = v_data.degree(s);
00377         while (s_degree >= 3)
00378         {
00379           leda::edge rr = v_data.cyclic_adj_succ(ee);
00380           ee = v_data.reversal(rr);
00381           visit[ee] = true;
00382           p_label.push_back(v_data[ee]);
00383           s = v_data.source(ee);
00384           s_degree = v_data.degree(s);
00385           leda::node t = v_data.target(ee);
00386           if (v_index[t] != -1)
00387           {
00388             leda::node s = v_data.source(ee);
00389             if (v_index[s] != -1)
00390             {
00391               if (c == 0 || c->front() != v_index[t])
00392               {
00393                 temp.push_back(curve_type());
00394                 c = &temp.back();
00395                 c->push_front(v_index[t]);
00396                 c->push_front(v_index[s]);
00397               }
00398               else
00399               {
00400                 c->push_front(v_index[s]);
00401               }
00402             }
00403             else if (v_outer[ee] != -1)
00404             {
00405               if (c == 0 || c->front() != v_index[t])
00406               {
00407                 temp.push_back(curve_type());
00408                 c = &temp.back();
00409                 c->push_front(v_index[t]);
00410                 c->push_front(v_outer[ee]);
00411               }
00412               else
00413               {
00414                 c->push_front(v_outer[ee]);
00415               }
00416               c = 0;
00417             }
00418             else
00419             {
00420               c = 0;
00421             }
00422           }
00423           else
00424           {
00425             leda::node s = v_data.source(ee);
00426             if (v_index[s] != -1 && v_outer[ee] != -1)
00427             {
00428               temp.push_back(curve_type());
00429               c = &temp.back();
00430               c->push_front(v_outer[ee]);
00431               c->push_front(v_index[s]);
00432             }
00433             else
00434             {
00435               c = 0;
00436             }
00437           }
00438         }
00439         break;
00440       }
00441     }
00442     while (ee != e);
00443 
00444     // merge curves segment and close path as needed
00445     // if (temp.size() > 1)
00446     {
00447       int p_kind;
00448       coord_type* p = 0;
00449       edge_type::iterator leave = temp.end();
00450       for (edge_type::iterator it = temp.begin(); it != temp.end(); ++it)
00451       {
00452         p = &ver[it->back()];
00453         if (p->xcoord == x1)
00454         {
00455           p_kind = 0;
00456           leave = it;
00457           break;
00458         }
00459         if (p->xcoord == x2)
00460         {
00461           p_kind = 2;
00462           leave = it;
00463           break;
00464         }
00465         if (p->ycoord == y1)
00466         {
00467           p_kind = 1;
00468           leave = it;
00469           break;
00470         }
00471         if (p->ycoord == y2)
00472         {
00473           p_kind = 3;
00474           leave = it;
00475           break;
00476         }
00477       }
00478       if (leave != temp.end())
00479       {
00480         temp.push_back(curve_type());
00481         curve_type* c = &temp.back();
00482         c->push_back(leave->back());
00483         int q_kind;
00484         coord_type* q = 0;
00485         edge_type::iterator enter = temp.end();
00486         for (edge_type::iterator it = temp.begin(); it != temp.end(); ++it)
00487         {
00488           q = &ver[it->front()];
00489           if (q->xcoord == x1)
00490           {
00491             q_kind = 0;
00492             enter = it;
00493             break;
00494           }
00495           if (q->xcoord == x2)
00496           {
00497             q_kind = 2;
00498             enter = it;
00499             break;
00500           }
00501           if (q->ycoord == y1)
00502           {
00503             q_kind = 1;
00504             enter = it;
00505             break;
00506           }
00507           if (q->ycoord == y2)
00508           {
00509             q_kind = 3;
00510             enter = it;
00511             break;
00512           }
00513         }
00514         assert(enter != temp.end());
00515 
00516         coord_type gg[4] =
00517         {
00518           { x1, y1 },
00519           { x2, y1 },
00520           { x2, y2 },
00521           { x1, y2 }
00522         };
00523         while (p_kind != q_kind)
00524         {
00525           if (gg[p_kind].xcoord != q->xcoord || gg[p_kind].ycoord != q->ycoord)
00526           {
00527             c->push_back(ver.size());
00528             ver.push_back(coord_type());
00529             ver.back() = gg[p_kind];
00530           }
00531           p_kind = (p_kind + 1) % 4;
00532         }
00533         c->push_back(enter->front());
00534       }
00535       merge_curves(temp);
00536     }

00538 #if 0
00539     {
00540       psstream out("curves.ps");
00541       out.selectmedia(psstream::FORMAT_A3, psstream::PORTRAIT);
00542       out.newpage();
00543 
00544       double dx = x2 - x1, dy = y2 - y1;
00545       double pg_width = out.pagewidth();
00546       double pg_height = out.pageheight();

00548       double px = pg_width - 2.0 * pg_margin;

00552       {
00553         x0 = pg_margin;
00554         sx = px;
00555         sy = px * dy / dx;
00556         y0 = 0.5 * (pg_height - sy);
00557       }
00558       else
00559       {
00560         y0 = pg_margin;
00561         sy = py;
00562         sx = py * dx / dy;
00563         x0 = 0.5 * (pg_width - sx);

00589 
00590     // move the result in the output container
00591     assert(temp.size() == 1);
00592     for (edge_type::iterator e_iter = temp.begin(); e_iter != temp.end(); ++e_iter)
00593     {
00594       pgn.push_back(curve_type());
00595       c = &pgn.back();
00596       c->splice(c->end(), *e_iter);
00597     }
00598 
00599     // find Sample record for curve c
00600     leda::node n_site = leda_nil;
00601     leda::list_item it = p_label.first();
00602     while (it != leda_nil)
00603     {
00604       leda::point p = p_label.contents(it);
00605       Inpoly s = inside_curve(p.xcoord(), p.ycoord(), ver, *c);
00606       if (s == INSIDE || s == BOUNDARY)
00607       {
00608         n_site = p_data.lookup(p);
00609         break;
00610       }
00611       it = p_label.succ(it);
00612     }
00613     if (it == leda_nil)
00614     {
00615       leda::node n;
00616       forall_nodes (n, p_data)
00617       {
00618         leda::point p = p_data[n];
00619         Inpoly s = inside_curve(p.xcoord(), p.ycoord(), ver, *c);
00620         if (s == INSIDE || s == BOUNDARY)
00621         {
00622           n_site = n;
00623           break;
00624         }
00625       }
00626     }
00627     if (n_site != leda_nil)
00628     {
00629       int i = s_data[n_site];
00630       arr[i] = c;
00631       assert(is_simple(ver, *c));
00632     }
00633   }
00634 }

00638 int main()
00639 {
00640   std::vector<double> xx, yy;
00641   double x, y, z;
00642   while (std::cin >> x >> y >> z)
00643   {
00644     xx.push_back(x);
00645     yy.push_back(y);
00646   }
00647 
00648   double x1 = 1380.0, x2 = 1429.0;
00649   double y1 = 706.0, y2 = 785.0;
00650   vertex_type ver;
00651   edge_type pgn;
00652   int n = xx.size();
00653   std::vector<curve_type*> arr(n);
00654   voro(n, &xx[0], &yy[0], x1, x2, y1, y2, ver, pgn, &arr[0]);
00655 
00656   psstream out("voronoi.ps");
00657   out.selectmedia(psstream::FORMAT_A3, psstream::PORTRAIT);
00658   out.newpage();
00659 
00660   double dx = x2 - x1, dy = y2 - y1;
00661   double pg_width = out.pagewidth();
00662   double pg_height = out.pageheight();
00663   double pg_margin = 40.0;
00664   double px = pg_width - 2.0 * pg_margin;
00665   double py = pg_height - 2.0 * pg_margin;
00666   double x0, y0, sx, sy;
00667   if (px * dy < py * dx)
00668   {
00669     x0 = pg_margin;
00670     sx = px;
00671     sy = px * dy / dx;
00672     y0 = 0.5 * (pg_height - sy);
00673   }
00674   else
00675   {
00676     y0 = pg_margin;
00677     sy = py;
00678     sx = py * dx / dy;
00679     x0 = 0.5 * (pg_width - sx);
00680   }
00681   x0 -= sx * x1 / dx;
00682   y0 -= sy * y1 / dy;
00683   sx /= dx;
00684   sy /= dy;
00685 
00686   // edge_clip(x1, y1, x2, y2, ver, pgn);
00687 
00688   for (vertex_type::iterator v = ver.begin(); v != ver.end(); ++v)
00689   {
00690     v->xcoord = x0 + sx * v->xcoord;
00691     v->ycoord = y0 + sy * v->ycoord;
00692   }
00693 
00694   out.setlinewidth(0);
00695   plotpath(out, ver, pgn);
00696   out.stroke();
00697 
00698   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00699   {
00700     out.arc(x0 + sx * xx[i], y0 + sy * yy[i], 0.5, 0, 360);
00701     out.fill();
00702   }
00703 
00704   return 0;
00705 }
00706 
00707 #endif
